snippet.title: Memories of Mars - Welcome to the Red Planet
snippet.description:
MEMORIES OF MARS is an open world online survival sandbox game developed by Limbic Entertainment and published by 505 Games. In a not-so-distant future, players will assume the role of a recently awoken human clone in the abandoned mining operations of The Red Planet, where the dream of colonizing and exploiting Mars has proven impossible and the planet has since been evacuated. 

MEMORIES OF MARS is built using Unreal Engine 4 and will be released on Steam Early Access for PC in Spring 2018.

Sign up today: www.memoriesofmars.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MemoriesOfMars
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MemoriesOfMars

For behind the scenes details on all of 505's games, head to the official 505 Games Blog: http://www.505games.com/blog
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/505Games
Twitter: https://twitter.com/505_Games
